Ein ganz nettes Game, an mich geht es aber nicht soo krass, darum kann bzw. konnte ich den "Hype" darum auch nicht ganz nachvollziehen. Für mich war nach ein paar Stündchen der Spielspaß bereits nicht mehr vorhanden. Dennoch läuft es gut, Server sind am Start, man kann sich nicht beschweren.

Revert these changes

Very well made game, great graphics and quality for price, perfect for with friends.
A couple connection issues here and there with occasional weird hitboxes, but aside from that it's perfect, definatly worth the money.

Despite the ruin changes and the overall funfactor decreasing because of long Queues and gen rushing teams, the good games in between, where survivors and killers are on even skill or even differ, Dead by Daylight is an awesome Game to play with friends or alone as the Killer. 10/10 would buy again.

Qué puedo decir qué no se haya dicho ya, el juego es una joya, tremendamente adictivo y te reta a autosuperarte continuamente. Graficamente esta bien, sonoramente tambien, y su jugabilidad está muy pulida. El unico punto negativo es parte de su comunidad, la toxicidad tanto de los killers camperos cómo de los survivors lo vuelve tedioso y pesado. Pero mas alla de eso, jugar con amigos es genial, no tiene precio lo bien qué lo pasas. Super recomendado.

good thriller

This is not a game, it is a commitment, an experience and mostly of all a lifestyle. 
The perk system might seem overwhelming at first, but give it some time and it will only open for new and creative playstyles.
This game seems very streamline and simple at first, yet the mechanics and the perk system only compliments and encourages experimentation. 
Lots of recognisable horror icons, also the original killers are well made and have been well written. 

Fair warning, this game is very addicting and you won't be able to shut up about it to all your friends. 
I've had good experiences from just gifting this game to all my friends forcing them to play with me.

If you don't like this game you are probably too scared to have watched any iconic horror/slasher (pun intended xd) films, grow a pear and bingewatch some horror movies. Then you will enjoy this game i promise you.
If you don't like this game, you are probably poor or just a scaredy cat, and you have no idea what good gaming is, then frick you.
